Description: Fragment of a carnelian ear- or hair-ring, broken off at one end, with a angular edges, triangular in section. On both sides a circumferential line, at the edge perpendicular small parallel lines. The stone is beige with black, partly red, breccia? Same as 0396b.
Bibliographic references: Spencer 1997 / Amara West I, The Architectural Report (p. 159)
